gameDetails.name: Dominion: Intrigue â€“ Update Pack
gameDetails.description:
Dominion: Intrigue Update Pack contains the seven new kingdom cards introduced in the second edition of Dominion: Intrigue, thereby allowing owners of the first edition to obtain these new cards without needing to repurchase the entire game.

The new cards: Lurker, Diplomat, Mill, Secret Passage, Courtier, Patrol, Replace

The following cards included in the first edition should be removed when using the Intrigue second edition Update Pack.
Secret Chamber, Great Hall, Coppersmith, Scout, Saboteur, Tribute

Part of the Dominion series.
